content.abstract: Introducing Site Quality Monitoring, a new feature in cPanel & WHM!
locale_abstract_strings: locale.maketext('Introducing Site Quality Monitoring, a new feature in cPanel [output,amp] WHM!')
locale.maketext('The Site Quality Monitoring feature watches your website for common issues. Check your website’s performance, availability, SEO, and more in one convenient cPanel interface.')
locale.maketext('You can manage access to this feature in WHM’s Feature Manager.')
